name: Shotgun Kids Bike Seat Handlebars - Youths
description:
Add these bars to your kid's seat and let your passenger feel like they’re in control. As and added bonus, they reduce your passenger’s desire to play with your gears.Includes inserts to fit most bar diameters (25.4mm, 31.8mm and 35mm).Works with both flat and riser bars.Rubber grips protect hands.Easy Allen key installation.25cm width. 
Designed to work with Shotgun Kids Front Mounted Child Seat.
